main function for parameter estimation

Source: R/main_optim.R
main_optim.Rd

main function for parameter estimation

main_optim(obs_list, crit_function, model_function, model_options = NULL,
  optim_method = "simplex", optim_options = NULL, prior_information)

Arguments

obs_list

List of observed values
crit_function

Function implementing the criterion to optimize
model_function

Crop Model wrapper function
model_options

List of options for the Crop Model wrapper (optional, see help of the Crop Model wrapper used)
optim_method

Name of the parameter estimation method (optional, see help of optim_switch function)
optim_options

List of options of the parameter estimation method: nb_rep, the number of repetitions (optional, default=1) (see help of optim_switch function))
prior_information

Prior information on the parameters to estimate. For the moment only uniform distribution are allowed. Either a list containing (named) vectors of upper and lower bounds (ub and lb), or a named list containing for each parameter the list of situations per group (sit_list) and the vector of upper and lower bounds (one value per group) (ub and lb)
param_names

Name(s) of parameters to estimate

Value

The vector of values for optimized parameters + prints and graphs, depending on the parameter estimation method used

Examples


library(SticsRFiles)
#> Learn SticsRFiles at: https://SticsRPacks.github.io/SticsRFiles
#> 
#> Attachement du package : 'SticsRFiles'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:SticsOptimizR':
#> 
#>     get_params_names
library(SticsOnR)
#> Learn SticsOnR at: https://SticsRPacks.github.io/SticsOnR
#> 
#> Attachement du package : 'SticsOnR'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:SticsRFiles':
#> 
#>     compute_doy_cumul, set_file, set_general, set_ini, set_out_var,
#>     set_param, set_plant, set_soil, set_station, set_tec, set_tmp,
#>     set_usm
library(SticsOptimizR)
library(dplyr)
#> Warning: le package 'dplyr' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.1
#> 
#> Attachement du package : 'dplyr'

library(nloptr)
#> Warning: le package 'nloptr' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.1
library(DiceDesign)
#> Warning: le package 'DiceDesign' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.3
library("doParallel")
#> Warning: le package 'doParallel' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.3
#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : foreach
#> Warning: le package 'foreach' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.1
#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : iterators
#> Warning: le package 'iterators' a été compilé avec la version R 3.5.1
#> Le chargement a nécessité le package : parallel


# TEST ON ONE SITUATION and ONE VARIABLE

# Select situation and variable
sit_name="bo96iN+"
var_name="lai_n"

# Run the model before optimization for a prior evaluation
stics_path="D:/Home/sbuis/Documents/WORK/STICS/JavaSTICS-1.41-stics-9.0/bin/stics_modulo"  # TO ADAPT TO YOUR CASE :-) ###
data_dir=system.file(file.path("extdata","TestCase1c"), package = "SticsOptimizR")
model_options=stics_wrapper_options(stics_path,data_dir,parallel=FALSE)
sim_before_optim=stics_wrapper(model_options=model_options)
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM bo96iN+ . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM bou00t1 . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM bou00t3 . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM bou99t1 . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM bou99t3 . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM lu96iN+ . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM lu96iN6 . 
#>   Model execution error !
#> Warning: Error running the Stics model for USM lu97iN+ . 
#>   Model execution error !

# Read and select the corresponding observations
obs_list=read_obs_to_list(file.path(model_options$data_dir,"Orig Data"),
                          obs_filenames = paste0(sit_name,".obs"))
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
obs_list[[sit_name]]=obs_list[[sit_name]][,c("Date",var_name)]

# Set prior information on the parameters to estimate
prior_information=list(lb=c(dlaimax=0.0005, durvieF=50),
                       ub=c(dlaimax=0.0025, durvieF=400))

# Set options for the parameter estimation method
optim_options=list()
optim_options$nb_rep <- 2 # How many times we run the minimization with different parameters
optim_options$xtol_rel <- 1e-05 # Tolerance criterion between two iterations
optim_options$maxeval <- 20 # Maximum number of iterations executed by the function
optim_options$path_results <- model_options$data_dir # path where to store results graphs

# Run the optimization
param_est_values=main_optim(obs_list=obs_list,crit_function=concentrated_wss,
                            model_function=stics_wrapper,
                            model_options=model_options,
                            optim_options=optim_options,
                            prior_information=prior_information)
#> [1] "Estimated value for dlaimax :  0.00169178095436655"
#> [1] "Estimated value for durvieF :  53.3737489345526"
#> [1] "Minimum value of the criterion : 130.26451007838"

# Run the model after optimzation
sim_after_optim=stics_wrapper(param_values=param_est_values,model_options=model_options)

# Plot the results
dev.new()
#> dev.new(): using pdf(file="Rplots6.pdf")
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
Ymax=max(max(obs_list[[sit_name]][,var_name], na.rm=TRUE),
         max(sim_before_optim$sim_list[[sit_name]][,var_name], na.rm=TRUE))
#> Warning: aucun argument pour max ; -Inf est renvoyé
plot(sim_before_optim$sim_list[[sit_name]][,c("Date",var_name)],type="l",
     main="Before optimization",ylim=c(0,Ymax+Ymax*0.1))
#> Warning: aucun argument trouvé pour min ; Inf est renvoyé
#> Warning: aucun argument pour max ; -Inf est renvoyé
#> Error in plot.window(...): 'xlim' nécessite des valeurs finies
points(obs_list[[sit_name]],col="green")
plot(sim_after_optim$sim_list[[sit_name]][,c("Date",var_name)],type="l",
     main="After optimization",ylim=c(0,Ymax+Ymax*0.1))
points(obs_list[[sit_name]],col="green")


# TEST WITH SEVERAL SITUATIONS AND USING GROUPS OF SITUATIONS PER PARAMETER

prior_information=list()
prior_information$dlaimax=list(sit_list=list(c("bou99t3", "bou00t3", "bou99t1", "bou00t1", "bo96iN+", "lu96iN+", "lu96iN6", "lu97iN+")),lb=0.0005,ub=0.0025)
prior_information$durvieF=list(sit_list=list(c("bo96iN+", "lu96iN+", "lu96iN6", "lu97iN+"), c("bou99t3", "bou00t3", "bou99t1", "bou00t1")),lb=c(50,50),ub=c(400,400))

stics_path="D:/Home/sbuis/Documents/WORK/STICS/JavaSTICS-1.41-stics-9.0/bin/stics_modulo"  # TO ADAPT TO YOUR CASE :-) ###
data_dir=system.file(file.path("extdata","TestCase1c"), package = "SticsOptimizR")
model_options=stics_wrapper_options(stics_path,data_dir, parallel=TRUE)

optim_options=list()
optim_options$nb_rep=2                              # How many times we run the minimization with different parameters
optim_options$xtol_rel=1e-05                        # Tolerance criterion between two iterations
optim_options$maxeval=3                             # Maximum number of iterations executed by the function
optim_options$path_results=model_options$data_dir   # path where to store results graphs

obs_list=read_obs_to_list(file.path(model_options$data_dir,"Orig Data"))
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique
#> Warning: NAs introduits lors de la conversion automatique

main_optim(obs_list=obs_list,crit_function=concentrated_wss,model_function=stics_wrapper,model_options=model_options,optim_options=optim_options,prior_information=prior_information)
